name: Hot Dogs with Pineapple Bacon Chipotle Slaw
author: Culinary Envy
summary: Grilled hot dogs with pineapple bacon chipotle slaw are the perfect summer holiday meal, combining sweet, smoky, cool, and crunchy! Other optional toppings: sliced red onion, red peppers, and yellow peppers.
ingredients: 3  chipotle chiles in adobo sauce, pureed
directions: Combine green cabbage, red cabbage, pineapple, carrot, bacon, red onion, and parsley in a large bowl
Whisk mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, chipotle puree, sugar, honey, Dijon mustard, onion powder, garlic powder, celery salt, salt, and pepper in a bowl until well combined
Pour over the cabbage mixture and toss well
Let stand for at least 15 minutes before serving
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate
Grill hot dogs until golden brown on all sides, about 7 minutes total
Place buns cut-side down on the grill and grill until lightly golden brown, about 20 seconds
Place hot dogs in the buns and top with cabbage slaw
